animal.question: I say 'Meow' and love to chase string. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I like to drink milk.
🧶 I love to play with yarn.
🐾 I have soft paws.

animal.question: I quack and swim in the pond. What am I?

hints.text: 🧡 I have orange feet.
🌾 I like to eat bread.
💦 I love being in the water.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🎾 I like to play fetch.
🏡 I live in a kennel.

animal.question: I say 'Moo' and give you milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 I have black and white spots.
🌱 I eat grass.
🥛I give you milk to drink.

animal.question: I jump and have a pouch to carry my baby. What am I?

hints.text: 🇦🇺 I live in Australia.
🌿 I eat plants.
🦘 I am famous for jumping high.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love to eat peanuts.
🐘 I am very big.
💧 I can spray water with my nose.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and run very fast. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I live in Africa.
🌿 I eat grass.
🐎 I look like a horse with stripes.

animal.question: I live in the ocean and have eight arms. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I have suckers on my arms.
🌊 I live under the sea.
🎨 I can squirt ink.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I have a spotted coat.
🌳 I eat leaves from tall trees.
🌍 I live in Africa.

animal.question: I am a big cat with a mane, known as the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I roar very loudly.
👑 I am the king of the jungle.
🥩 I am a predator that likes to eat meat.

transport.question: I go 'beep beep!' and take you for a ride. What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 Mommy and Daddy drive me.
🛣️ I have wheels and go on the road.
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 I can carry your whole family.

transport.question: I float on the water and take people across. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am much bigger than a rubber ducky.
⚓ I can have a horn that goes 'Toot!'
🛟 You need a life vest on me!

transport.question: I have two wheels and you pedal me to go. What am I?

hints.text: 👧 You might wear a helmet when using me
🔔 I have a bell that you can ring.
🦵 You use your legs to move me.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people far away. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am bigger than a bird.
✈️ I have wings and an engine.
🌍 I can take you to different countries.

transport.question: I am big and red, and take children to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🛑 I have flashing lights when people get on and off
🎒 Lots of kids ride me together.
🚌 I am longer than a car.

transport.question: I run on tracks and take people on a long journey. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I go 'choo choo!'
💺 You can sit in seats inside of me.
🧑‍✈️ A conductor helps to drive.

transport.question: I help people who are sick or hurt. I have a siren. What am I?

hints.text: 🚑 I have a cross on my side.
🚨 I go 'wee-ooh, wee-ooh!'
🏥 I take people to the hospital.

transport.question: I help put out fires. I am red and have a ladder. What am I?

hints.text: 👨‍🚒 Firefighters use me.
🚨 I also have a siren.
🔥 I use water to stop bad things.

transport.question: I fly high above the Earth, even higher than an airplane. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I go into space!
👩‍🚀 Astronauts travel in me.
🌌 I am very fast and powerful.

transport.question: I carry many cars across the water. I am a big, big boat! What am I?

hints.text: 🚢 You can drive your car onto me!
🌎 I travel long distances across the ocean.
🚗 I transport vehicles.
